content:
From: Lawrence Paulson <lp15@cam.ac.uk>
I’m happy to announce another new entry, Skip Lists, by Max W. Haslbeck and Manuel Eberl. Abstract:

I’m particularly impressed because I took a look at this tricky data structure myself several years ago, and couldn’t get my head around it at all. And here we have even a probabilistic analysis!

https://www.isa-afp.org/entries/Skip_Lists.html

Larry
